com.zookitec.layout
Class ContainerEF

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.zookitec.layout.ContainerEF
public class ContainerEF
extends java.lang.Object

An expression factory used to create expressions for attributes of the container being laid out.

centerY

public static Expression centerY(java.awt.Container container)

gridX

public static Expression gridX(java.awt.Container container,
                               int gridColumn,
                               Expression cellWidth)
Gets an expression for the left x coordinate of the grid column specified by gridColumn. The grid is positioned at the left of the container with cell width defined by the specified cellWidth expression.
For example, to get an expression for the left x coordinate of column 3 of a 6 column grid that fills the container, you could call this method as follows:

ContainerEF.gridX(3, ContainerEF.widthFraction(1 / 6.0));

Parameters:
gridColumn - the grid column index starting at 0.
cellWidth - an expression for the grid cell width.
Returns:
an expression

gridY

public static Expression gridY(java.awt.Container container,
                               int gridRow,
                               Expression cellHeight)
Gets an expression for the top y coordinate of the grid row specified by gridRow. The grid is positioned at the top of the container with cell height defined by the specified cellHeight expression.

Parameters:
gridRow - the grid row index starting at 0.
cellHeight - an expression for the grid cell height.
Returns:
an expression
